passwordShape: Must have at least 8 characters, a lowercase and an uppercase letter, a number and a special character.
forgotPasswordSubtitle: We will be sending an email with a code to create a new password.
forgotPasswordDescription: Please, enter the email address you are registered with in the input below.
emailSent: Email successfully sent to {{email}}, please check your inbox to reset your password.
codeReceived: You will receive a code in your inbox. Please enter it below.

password.label: Password
password.validationUppercase: Must have at least an uppercase letter
password.validationLowercase: Must have at least a lowercase letter
password.validationNumber: Must have at least a number
password.validationSpecialChar: Must have at least a special character
